title: Nutcracker

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Stand guard at another player's house

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If someone attacks your target, you will take the hit and the other visitors your target will learn your attacker's name.
- If someone attacks you directly, your target and visitors will learn your attacker's name.

desc:
Post 4626
*He's got a thing against mice.*
